description:
Sound knowledge of personal financial planning is an important business and life skill. Wealth accumulation and protection is also a valued financial goal of many
individuals and families. This course aims to equip individuals with skills to manage their personal finances and private wealth. As the course covers many current
topics in financial planning and wealth management, it will also particularly benefit students aspiring to enter the financial planning and wealth management industry.
title: Personal Finance and Wealth Management
prerequisite: Understanding of time value of money, financial statements, risk and return, basic statistics and regression analysis
